verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa mathurāya gele, gopīra ye daśā haila
kṛṣṇa-vicchede prabhura se daśā upajila

synonyms: kṛṣṇa mathurāya gele—when Lord Kṛṣṇa departed for Mathurā; gopīra—of the gopīs; ye daśā—which condition; haila—was; kṛṣṇa-vicchede—by separation from Kṛṣṇa; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; se daśā—that situation; upajila—happened.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu felt separation from Kṛṣṇa, His condition exactly corresponded to the condition of the gopīs in Vṛndāvana after Kṛṣṇa's departure for Mathurā.
